actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase the amount which individuals may earn without suffering deductions from benefits on account of excess earnings, and for other purposes.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Increases to $3,000, under title II of the Social Security Act, (Old-Age, Survivors' and Disability Insurance), the amount which individuals may earn without suffering deductions from benefits on account of excess earnings. Increases to $12,300 the amount of earnings which may be counted annually for social security tax withholding purposes pursuant to title II of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase the amount which individuals may earn without suffering deductions from benefits on account of excess earnings, and for other purposes.
